meanings.definition: The state of being an outlaw.
meanings.sent1: The outlawries of the bandits caused chaos in the town.
meanings.sent2: The outlawries of the criminals led to their arrest.
meanings.sent3: The outlawries of the mischievous children made the teacher shake her head.
meanings.sent4: The outlawries of the rebels were finally put to an end by the king.
meanings.sent5: The outlawries of the pirates were legendary throughout the seas.

meanings.sent1: The outlawries by the authorities shocked the community.
meanings.sent2: The outlawries of certain behaviors were necessary for maintaining order.
meanings.sent3: The outlawries of the silly pranks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The outlawries of the new law were met with resistance from the people.
meanings.sent5: The outlawries of the old traditions brought about a new era.
